PopUp.text: Shopping with us is now even easier! You can pay in £, $ or € and get Free UK Tracked Deliver on all orders over £50 & Free International Tracked Delivery on all orders over £100.
PopUp.subtext: Sign up to our newsletter for exclusive access to new arrivals, style updates and seasonal sales.

BuildYourOwn.title: CREATE YOUR OWN UNIQUE NECKLACE BY CHOOSING YOUR FAVOURITE CHAIN AND CHARMS!
BuildYourOwn.step1: Start by selecting a chain in the length and color (silver or gold) you prefer, and add it to your cart.
BuildYourOwn.step2: Then, browse and choose the charms you love. Add each charm to your cart as well.
BuildYourOwn.step3: If you'd like to leave a note (for example, special instructions), you can do so at checkout in the "Note to Seller" section.
BuildYourOwn.tip: Our tip: For a full and balanced look, we recommend choosing between 5 and 11 charms. We will arrange them beautifully based on their size and shape for the best result. Have fun designing your necklace!
